title: 13b02 - Coal dealers.
text:
Coal dealers need not
show compliance in making sporadic deliveries where the extent and timing of
such deliveries are unpredictable, insofar as their yard, dock, and subsequent
operations, including delivery, are concerned.
html: Coal dealers need not show compliance in making sporadic deliveries where the extent and timing of such deliveries are unpredictable, insofar as their yard, dock, and subsequent operations, including delivery, are concerned.
